value.title: Deploy Power BI dataset schema changes WITHOUT refreshing!

Patrick shows how you can deploy schema changes without needing to perform the refresh with Power BI Premium and the ALM Toolkit. value.excerpt: In this 2 minute Tuesday, Patrick looks at how to use Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration.
